statements: DELETE FROM soil_health_data WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND temperature > 25
DELETE FROM SensorInfo WHERE sensor_id = 101 AND location = 'Garden';
DELETE FROM SoilData WHERE timestamp < '2021-01-01' AND soil_moisture > 0.5;
DELETE FROM weather_data WHERE location = 'New York' AND temperature > 20;
DELETE FROM SoilAnalysis WHERE sensor_id = 101 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM SensorLocation WHERE location_id = 201 AND latitude < 30.0
DELETE FROM soil_analysis WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
